attributes.action: Raising awareness for Self Harm - The Wish Centre
attributes.additional_details:
We are the pupils of Hatch End High School, and we want to help and promote the Wish Center to help raise awareness for the victims who self-harm. We want to help these people as they are overlooked in society. As a result of this petition,we want more awareness to be raised about the issue and the charity, so that they will be financially stable and help support the fatalities of self harm.
We call upon the council to help fund the charity so that they can continue in helping the young people affected.
